t: Amazon coat - Wikipedia
s: April 18, 2025 - The 092 coat (aka The Amazon Coat) by Chinese brand Orolay went viral on the internet from the period between December 2018 and the COVID-19 pandemic. It became street fashion. The Amazon Coat was sold by Orolay on Amazon prior to 2016, but had received little popularity or notice.
